frontmatter.title: Create IAM Policy
frontmatter.description: The AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry Collector requires permissions to publish app metrics and container metrics to AWS CloudWatch Logs and sending app traces to AWS X-Ray. In this section, we will create an IAM policy with proper permission.
